amendatorysection.chaptername: State Uni., State Colleges, and Post. Education
amendatorysection.para: The authority may charge and collect rates, rents, fees, and other charges for the use of and for the services furnished or to be furnished by a project or any portion thereof and contract with any person, partnership, limited liability company, association, or corporation or other body public or private, except that the authority shall have no jurisdiction over rates, rents, fees, and charges established by a private institution of higher education for its students other than to require that such rates, rents, fees, and charges by such institution be sufficient to discharge such institution's obligation to the authority.
